name: Modern Art Critic Hero (Ludum Dare 41, Compo)
name_original: Modern Art Critic Hero (Ludum Dare 41, Compo)
description:
Developed for Ludum Dare 41 Compo, Modern Art Critic Hero is a mashup of the rhythm game and walking sim genres. 

Play as Mr. Critic on his personal journey to become the world's premiere modern art critic. Explore the museum and contemplate life, existence, and the exhibits.
